issue.title: www.wikipedia.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.wikipedia.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.wikipedia.org%2F) ### Comment > When using adguard and trying to go to a site that uses HSTS it displays that screen and the only way to get to the site is by turning adguard off which defeats the purpose of the app. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/4jo79xliugw0g0084o800448csg0skcs360rpot834.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/7yv53vok6rggsc4cw8sow4s0go0k0o82y4txkoye6c.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v4.12.2 System version: | `Android 16` Browser: | Firefox Mobile License type: | paid AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Self-destructing first-party cookies (4320)

**Browser API**:
Block WebRTC

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `1.1.1.1`
filters: `https://filters.adtidy.org/android/filters/15_optimized.txt` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads,
EasyList

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
EasyPrivacy,
Peter Lowe's Blocklist,
Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List,
Legitimate URL Shortener

Social widgets:
AdGuard Social Media,
Fanboy's Social Blocking List

Annoyances:
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Cookie Notices

Security:
uBlock Origin – Badware risks,
Online Malicious URL Blocklist,
Phishing URL Blocklist,
Scam Blocklist by DurableNapkin

Other:
AdGuard DNS,
Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.meta.js` Other extensions used: | `Norton` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=and&product_version=4.12.2&system_version=Android+16&browser=firefox+mobile&filters=118.257.2.101.204.17.123.208.20.11.21.22.4.255.19.18.225.239.256.251.15.3&dns_servers=1.1.1.1&userscripts=https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.meta.js&android.mode=VPN&android.system_root=false&dns.filters=https%253A%252F%252Ffilters.adtidy.org%252Fandroid%252Ffilters%252F15_optimized.txt&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&https.filtering=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=true&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=false&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.first_party_cookies=4320&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&license_type=paid&dns.timeout=5000)
